body_html:
This gist can be used for freezing models. Do not include is_training in the list of whitelisted nodes.
You may have to change a couple of hardcorded node-names to fit your needs.

Hope it helps. :)
body_text:
This gist can be used for freezing models. Do not include is_training in the list of whitelisted nodes.
You may have to change a couple of hardcorded node-names to fit your needs.
Hope it helps. :)
body:
[This gist](https://gist.github.com/ronny3050/d3dc669601a5604b347365ed652645dd) can be used for freezing models. Do not include `is_training` in the list of whitelisted nodes. 
You may have to change a couple of hardcorded node-names to fit your needs.

Hope it helps. :)
